price: دەگەڕێن بەسەریاندا کوڕانی نەوجەوانی ئێسك سووکی خۆیان وخزمەتیان دەکەن، وەك مرواری ناو سەدەفن (لە جوانی وپاکیدا)
arabic: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ غِلۡمَانٞ لَّهُمۡ كَأَنَّهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤٞ مَّكۡنُونٞ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayaṭūfu ʿalayhim ghil'mānun lahum ka-annahum lu'lu-on maknūnun
